column4: hey question about evolution:  does it offer auto complete on the TO field like outlook does?  (its not enabled by default)
I dont think so, but the To button is a button that brings up your contact list.
is there anyway to have auto complete on any client?
thunderbird etc...
i live for that feature
Dunno. I uninstalled my thunderbird. I use evolution. Though I only ever mail 3-4 people at a time.
Acutally I'm wrong. It does have autocomplete.
to people on your contact list.
howd you do autocomplete
whad you need to do... add a bunch of contacts?
You must have the person in your contacts. I don't think it'll go by the people you have gotten mail from.
another question... do you know how to make the reading pane to the right of recieved mail (instead of below it ) ?:
I'm not entirely sure you can. . .
sweet!!!!!! figured it out
Really? What was it?
view ==> preview ==> vertical view
i love this view
I see. Well, glad you got it goin. :)
You can also schedule tasks by clicking the time, then double clicking a day. If you use the calendar anyway.
do you send email thru gmails smtp?
No, I don't. I use my company's smtp. . .
